patthana18.5:1.1_0: Hetuṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:2.1_0: Hetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:4.1_0: Hetuṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:5.1_0: Hetuṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:6.1_0: Hetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:7.1_0: Hetuṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:8.1_0: Hetuṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:9.1_0: Hetuṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:10.1_0: Nahetuṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:12.1_0: Hetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:12.1_1: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:12.1_2: Hetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavañca nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:13.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
